div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1125 Vinogradnoe, Anapa raion, Kras- nodar Territory, RSFSR, 1964 Burial: 120-110 B.C. Contents: 139+ AE. Pot hoard Panticapaeum: 84 AE (as BMC 41 [6], 44 [68]; Zograph, pl. 42, 11 [10]) Phanagoria: 55 AE (as BMC 2-3) Disposition: Anapa Salov, "Klad bosporskikh monet iz poselka Vino- gradnogo," NE 12 (in press)
